text: Coco is a 2017 Mexican-American computer-animated musical fantasy movie. ==Production== It was made by Pixar and The Jim Henson Company. The director Lee Unkrich and Adrian Molina. The movie stars the voices of Anthony Gonzalez and Benjamin Bratt. ==Main character== The movie centers on a boy named Miguel who dreams of being a musician and is later taken to the afterlife on DÃ­a de los Muertos. ==Release== Coco was released on November 22, 2017. It was released with Olaf's Frozen Adventure, a short movie that runs for about 14 minutes in theaters before Coco is shown. ==References== Category:2017 fantasy movies Category:2017 musical movies Category:2017 adventure movies Category:2010s American musical movies Category:2017 computer-animated movies Category:2010s American adventure movies Category:American family movies Category:American musical fantasy movies Category:Halloween movies Category:Mexican fantasy movies Category:Mexican adventure movies Category:Mexican musical movies Category:Movies composed by Michael Giacchino Category:Movies set in Mexico Category:Movies that won the Best Animated Feature Academy Award Category:Movies that won the Best Original Song Academy Award Category:Pixar movies
title: Coco (2017 movie)
